synopsis.text: Hermes, Mars, Medici, and St. George, four renowned Greco-Roman statues, take center stage in the world of idol entertainment as the Rockies, a boy band with a twist, in the anime "Sekko Boys." Managing this unique group falls into the hands of Miki Ishimoto, a recent college graduate eager to make her mark in the industry. As she begins her first day at Holbein Entertainment Co., Miki finds herself tasked with the unusual responsibility of guiding these stone-cold idols to stardom. With the odds stacked against her, can Miki navigate the competitive idol landscape and bring the Rockies the success they deserve? Join Miki and the Rockies in this one-of-a-kind adventure that redefines the meaning of idol stardom.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
